sections.title: Preperation questions
sections.shortName: Have you got all the information you need?

fields.infoText: Please read the European Commission’s Authorised Economic Operator (AEO) Guidelines, TAXUD/B2/047/2011– REV6), before applying for AEO. This is available via the European Commission’s Europa website.

fields.label: Which departments, including management, have you involved in the process to prepare your company for the AEO application? Have you involved customs or third parties in the process (consultants etc)?
fields.errorMessage: Who has been involved?

fields.label: What authorisation do you require?
Name of business applying
fields.helpText: Input the name of the business that is applying here
fields.errorMessage: Business name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Is the address where this business is registered in the UK?
Full registered UK address of the business
Full registered address of the business
fields.helpText: Input the full registered address for your business including country
fields.errorMessage: Input the full registered address for your business including country

fields.helpText: Input your Economic operator registration and identification number here
fields.errorMessage: Input your Economic operator registration and identification number

fields.label: Select your business legal status
Describe your business status
fields.helpText: Input details of your business legal status - other
fields.errorMessage: Input details of your business legal status

fields.label: Date of establishment
fields.helpText: Enter the date you started trading, or in the case of a company, the date of your certificate of incorporation
fields.errorMessage: Date of establishment can only include numbers in this format dd mm yyyy

fields.label: Is the address where the main accounts for customs puposes are kept the same as the Registered business address?
fields.shortName: Customs accounts addess same as Registered business address

fields.label: Is the address where the main accounts for customs puposes are kept, in the UK?
UK address where the main accounts for customs puposes are kept
Address where the main accounts for customs puposes are kept
fields.errorMessage: Input the full address where the main accounts for customs puposes are kept, including country

fields.label: VAT registration number(s)
fields.helpText: Enter your VAT registration number(s)
fields.errorMessage: Enter the VAT registration number(s) of your company

fields.label: Are you the person responsible for customs matters in relation to this application?
fields.shortName: I am the person responsible for customs matters

fields.label: Name of the person responsible for customs matters
fields.helpText: input name here
fields.errorMessage: Responsible persons name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.label: Is this persons address the same as the registered business address or the address where the main accounts for customs puposes are kept?
fields.shortName: Responsible person address same as business or customs address

fields.label: Is the responsible persons address in the UK?
fields.shortName: Responsible person address in the UK

fields.shortName: UK address for the person responsible for customs matters

fields.label: Address for the person responsible for customs matters

fields.errorMessage: Input the full address for the person responsible for customs matters, including country

Designated contact within the compant.

fields.helpText: input name here

fields.label: Position held in the company
fields.helpText: Enter the designated contacts position in the company
fields.errorMessage: Enter your position in the company

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: input contact telephone number here
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid telephone number

fields.label: Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.label: Person in charge of the applicant company or exercising control of its management
fields.helpText: input name here
fields.errorMessage: Name of person in charge can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.helpText: Enter the person in charges position in the company
fields.errorMessage: Enter the person in charges position in the company

fields.label: Date of birth
fields.helpText: Enter the date of birth
fields.errorMessage: Date of birth can only include numbers in this format dd mm yyyy

fields.label: National insurance number
fields.helpText: Enter the person in charges national insurance number if they have one, otherwise input No NINO
fields.errorMessage: National insurance numbers must be input the format letter, letter, six numbers, letter for example AB123456C

fields.infoText:
Provide evidence such as a letter from your auditors or an audited report, a copy of your finalised accounts (including your management accounts) – if your accounts have not been audited, evidence from your bank or financial institution.

 We accept documents in formats like pdf and jpeg (5mb maximum).
